title: Away Moderation
announcement: Away is an open source state of the art Discord Moderation bot developed for Discord Hack Week.

help.description: Relay information about the Away Moderation Bot.

prefix.description: Change the phrase used as the prefix. Default is ^.
prefix.error: Please specify a single phrase to set a new prefix.
prefix.success: You have updated Away's prefix succesfully.

smartfilter.description: Manage the smart filter feature status.
smartfilter.error: Please specify the desired status or threshold for the smart filter.
smartfilter.success: You have updated Away's smart filter status succesfully.

filterpunish.description: Manage the punishments given after a certain amount of flags.
filterpunish.error: Please specify a punishment type and flag limit for filter punishments.
filterpunish.success: You have updated Away's string evaluation punishments succesfully.

blacklist.description: Blacklist a certain word for flagging by string evaluation.
blacklist.error: Please specify if you're adding or removing a word and the word you're targeting.
blacklist.success: You have updated Away's string evaluation blacklist.
blacklist.includesError: The word you're trying to add may already be on the list, or it doesn't exist.

dump.description: Dump all data tied to Away in your server.
dump.success: We have succesfully retrieved your data.

reset.description: Wipe and reset your server data for Away.
reset.success: You have wiped and reset Away's data for your server.
